de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.pipeline

Class FilterPipelineBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.pipeline.FilterPipelineBuilder

  • public class FilterPipelineBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A Builder class to easily create data pipelines of any length.

    This builder class can only handle AbstractFilter subclasses, for it shall have an unified interface to chain the elements.

      • append

        public void append(AbstractFilter sink,
                   int index)
            throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Insert an AbstractFilter pipeline element into an arbitrary position. Shifts the element currently at that position (if any) and any subsequent elements to the right (adds one to their indices).
        Parameters:
        sink - the sink to be added
        index - where to put the
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - - if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index > size())

      • get

        public AbstractFilter get(int index)
        Get the element at the supplied index. You must not call AbstractFilter.close() without calling remove(int) first.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the element
        Returns:
        the abstract filter that is at the given position

        Parameters:

      • build

        public NetworkDataSink build(NetworkDataSink lastElement)
        Chain the given pipeline elements, putting a NetworkDataSink as the last element
        Parameters:
        lastElement - the final element to receive data from this pipeline
        Returns:
        head of the pipeline, or null if no elements were added
